name: Dannii Minogue
label: Mushroom Records, MCA Records
associated_acts: Kylie Minogue, Ruth Lorenzo, Stacey Solomon, Rhydian, Leon Jackson, Matt Cardle
description: A dance track that features Minogue's vocals over a heavy bass line.
format: Ogg In March 2003, Minogue released her fourth album, ''Neon Nights'', which the BBC called ''"a pleasant cocktail of pop sophistication, club culture and accessibility"''.   It consisted of 1980s inspired dance-pop songs and provided Minogue with some of the strongest reviews of her career. ''Neon Nights'' peaked at number eight on the UK albums chart (her highest ranking since her debut), and produced four top ten singles.<ref name
